Project.Name: Extension DLL
Project.Description: MFC extension DLL targeting VC++/MFC 6.0 (MBCS build)

Macro.Name: $RESBASE$
Macro.Description: First symbol value for a resource ID (1 to 28671)

Macro.Name: $CMDBASE$
Macro.Description: First symbol value for a command ID (32768 to 57343)

Macro.Name: $CTRLBASE$
Macro.Description: First symbol value for a control ID (8 to 57343)

Macro.Name: $SYMBASE$
Macro.Description: First symbol value for a manually created ID
